p: The final SARIMA models for weekday ARI counts were of the form SARIMA (1,0,1)(0,1,1) 260 for CDA1 and CDA2, but were of a different form for the synthetic backgrounds i.e. SARIMA (0,1,1)(1,0,1) 260 and SARIMA (1,0,1) (1,0,1) 260 for the s17 and the s33 time series, respectively. Models for the weekend ARI counts were all of the form SARIMA (1,0,1)(0,1,1) 104. Case counts retrieved by CDA3 were low, and did not allow SARIMA modeling.
